nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') FROM SyntheticCheck SINCE 7 day ago

select count(*) FROM Transaction since 1 day ago
from ComputeSample SELECT count(hostname)

select count(*) FROM Transaction since 1 day ago facet appName

select average(duration) FROM Transaction since 1 day ago compare with 1 day ago TIMESERIES

SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView since 1 day ago facet domain  timeseries
select average(duration) FROM Transaction since 1 day ago facet appName TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Mobile App Usage by app version

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(responseTime) from MobileRequest facet appVersion TIMESERIES since  1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM MobileCrash  WHERE crashFingerprint NOT IN(  ) FACET `appVersion` since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Mobile App Session Duration by Mobile Device

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(sessionDuration) FROM MobileRequest SINCE 1 day ago facet deviceModel
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability', average(duration) as 'Duration' FROM SyntheticCheck  SINCE 1 day ago FACET monitorName
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability' FROM SyntheticCheck  SINCE 1 week ago FACET locationLabel TIMESERIES 1 hour
SELECT average(duration) FROM SyntheticCheck  SINCE 1 week ago FACET locationLabel TIMESERIES 1 hour
SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Visitors' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') FROM SyntheticCheck SINCE 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT 100 - percentage(count(*), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Downtime' FROM SyntheticCheck SINCE 1 month ago facet location limit 5
SELECT uniqueCount(session)*100 AS 'Users' FROM PageView SINCE 5 minute ago UNTIL 1 minute ago TIMESERIES 1 second
SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal)/100 As 'Revenue' FROM Transaction since 1 week ago FACET weekdayOf(timestamp)
SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal)/400 As 'Revenue' FROM Transaction since 1 day ago
SELECT uniqueCount(username)/10 as 'Users Experiencing Errors' from Transaction where error IS NOT NULL since 1 day ago
SELECT histogram(duration*2,10) as Duration FROM PageView since 1 day ago
SELECT percentile(totalTime, 50, 90, 99) FROM Transaction WHERE httpResponseCode = '200' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT percentile(totalTime, 50, 90, 99) FROM Transaction WHERE  httpResponseCode = '500' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Latency - 90 Percentile with Username

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(totalTime, 90) FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago FACET username limit 20

widgets.title: Golden Signals Latency - HTTP 500 - Trend Analysis

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE  httpResponseCode = '500' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour COMPARE WITH 1 day ago EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Minute

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) AS 'Requests per Minute' FROM Transaction  since 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Hour

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction  since 7 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour  EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Hour with Username

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction  since 1 day ago FACET username limit 20

widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Hour - Trend Analysis

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction  since 7 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - HTTP Status Codes

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '1%') as '1xx Informational', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '2%') as '2xx Success', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '3%') as '3xx Redirection', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%') as '4xx Client Error', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%') as '5xx Server Error' FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true) AS 'Unhandled Error rate %' FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - HTTP Code Redirection, Client Error And Server Error by Transaction Name

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE  httpResponseCode LIKE '3%' or httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' OR httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' SINCE 1 day ago FACET httpResponseCode, name TIMESERIES 10 minutes

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - Top 5 Unhandled Application Errors

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError  FACET error.class SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute limit 5 EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - Top 10 Unhandled Application Errors with Transaction Name and Host

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError WHERE  username IS NOT NULL FACET username, error.message, transactionName, host SINCE 1 day ago limit 10

widgets.title: Golden Signals Errors - HTTP Code Redirection, Client Error And Server Error

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '3%' as 'Redirection'), filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' as 'Client Error'), filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' as 'Server Error') FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minutes EXTRAPOLATE
SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 50, 90, 99) FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE

widgets.title: Golden Signals Saturation - Top 5 Database 90 Percentile by Host and Transaction Name

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 90) FROM Transaction  FACET host, name TIMESERIES 1 hour since  1 day ago

widgets.title: Golden Signals Saturation - Database 90 Percentile with Username

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 90) FROM Transaction  FACET username SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET appName SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET `error.message` SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET `error.message` SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 5 minutes
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET httpResponseCode SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET transactionName SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError FACET `request.headers.referer` SINCE 1 day ago

![Image](https://newrelic.com/content/dam/component-assets/u03-navigation/logo-apm.svg)
* Use below charts to filter this dashboard by App, by Transaction, by Response Code and/or by Host, or below links to dive deeper in the New Relic portal
* [Web Portal App Overview](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/applications/)
* [Web Portal App Deployments](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/applications/43192210/deployments)
* [Service Maps](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/service_maps)
* [Key Transactions](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/key_transactions)
* [Distributed Tracing](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/2040817/applications/156206528/tracing?duration=1800000&facetType=TRACE_HAS_ERRORS&query=&sortBy=2&sortDir=DESC)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) from Transaction since 1 hour ago compare WITH 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) from Transaction since 1 day ago compare WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET appName since 1 hour ago
SELECT average(duration) from Transaction since 1 hour ago compare WITH 1 day ago
SELECT average(duration) FROM Transaction FACET appName since 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET httpResponseCode SINCE 1 hour ago
SELECT count(*) from Transaction since 1 day ago facet name TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago facet host
SELECT histogram(duration) from Transaction since 1 day ago facet name
SELECT count(*) from Transaction since 1 day ago facet name
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago facet host TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' facet host SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%') FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%') FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError facet appName,`error.message` since 1 hour ago
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET name WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT appName, host, transactionSubtype, transactionType, name FROM Transaction WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT histogram(databaseDuration) FROM Transaction FACET buckets(databaseDuration, width: 10, buckets: 10) SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 20
SELECT histogram(databaseDuration) FROM Transaction FACET appName  SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
SELECT histogram(databaseDuration) FROM Transaction FACET name SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10

widgets.title: Pearson correlation - transaction duration/db call count

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT (count(*) * sum(duration * databaseCallCount) - sum(duration) * sum(databaseCallCount)) / (sqrt(count(*) * sum(pow(duration,2)) - pow(sum(duration),2)) * (sqrt(count(*) * sum(pow(databaseCallCount,2)) - pow(sum(databaseCallCount),2)))) as 'pearson correlation' from Transaction where databaseCallCount is NOT NULL facet appName since 1 week ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT sum(databaseDuration) as 'Time', count(*) as 'Count', percentile(databaseDuration, 99, 80, 50) as 'DB' FROM Transaction FACET name SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 15
SELECT average(cpuPercent) as '%CPU Used' FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes)*100/average(memoryTotalBytes) as '%RAM Used' FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) as '%CPU Used' FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample FACET `entityName` since 1 day ago limit 20
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes*100) FROM SystemSample  FACET `entityName` since 1 day ago limit 20
SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) from SystemSample facet entityName  since 1 day ago limit 20
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES FACET `entityName` since 1 day ago
SELECT average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes*100) FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES FACET `entityName` since 1 day ago
SELECT average(diskUsedPercent) from SystemSample facet entityName  since 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT histogram(cpuPercent, width: 100, buckets: 20) FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT histogram((memoryUsedBytes*100)/memoryTotalBytes, width: 100, buckets: 20) FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT histogram(diskUsedPercent, width: 100, buckets: 20) FROM SystemSample SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(loadAverageFiveMinute) FROM SystemSample FACET `entityName` since 1 day ago
SELECT average(loadAverageFiveMinute) FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES FACET `entityName` since 1 day ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM ProcessSample  FACET commandName   LIMIT 10 SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM ProcessSample  FACET commandName  TIMESERIES  LIMIT 10 SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(readBytesPerSecond) as 'Reads', average(writeBytesPerSecond) as 'Writes' FROM StorageSample SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*), average(threadCount), average(cpuPercent), average(cpuSystemPercent) FROM ProcessSample FACET commandName SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(readBytesPerSecond+writeBytesPerSecond) FROM StorageSample TIMESERIES FACET `entityName` since 1 day ago

SELECT average(SystemSample.cpuPercent) as 'CPU-avg.', (average(SystemSample.memoryUsedBytes)*100/average(SystemSample.memoryTotalBytes)) as 'RAM-avg.', average(SystemSample.diskUsedPercent) as 'Disk-avg.', average(NetworkSample.receiveBytesPerSecond/1000) as 'In-KB/sec', average(NetworkSample.transmitBytesPerSecond/1000) as 'Out-KB/sec' FROM SystemSample, NetworkSample, ProcessSample since 1 week ago facet hostname, environment, coreCount, operatingSystem, linuxDistribution   limit 500
SELECT count(receivePacketsPerSecond) as 'Packets Per Second' FROM NetworkSample SINCE 15 minutes AGO compare with 15 minutes ago
SELECT count(receivePacketsPerSecond) FROM NetworkSample SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(receiveBytesPerSecond) as 'Inbound BW' FROM NetworkSample facet hostname SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(receiveBytesPerSecond) as 'Inbound BW', average(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Outbound BW' FROM NetworkSample SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(transmitPacketsPerSecond) FROM NetworkSample SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(transmitBytesPerSecond) as 'Outbound BW' FROM NetworkSample facet hostname SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) from Log since 1 day ago TIMESERIES MAX FACET host
SELECT count(*) from Log WHERE message LIKE '%error%' since 1 day ago TIMESERIES MAX
SELECT host, pod_name, message from Log WHERE message LIKE '%error%' and host IS NOT NULL since 1 day ago LIMIT max

* Use below charts to filter by Domain, Category, Device, Country or Browser
* Use calendar options on the right to filter
* Narrow results up to 1 URL from the URL Heatmap
* Compare funnels between slow & fast pages
* Compare Front-End vs Back-End Performance
* [Dive deeper into Real User Monitoring](https://rpm.newrelic.com/accounts/1606862/browser)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  facet domain  since 1 day ago TIMESERIES

SELECT average(duration) FROM PageView FACET deviceType TIMESERIES SINCE 1 DAY AGO

SELECT count(*) FROM PageView  facet userAgentName   since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Average Page Load Time (Front-end vs Backend)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) as 'Average PLT (sec)', average(backendDuration) as 'Backend Time (sec)', average(networkDuration) as 'Network (sec)' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(networkDuration) as 'Network (sec)', average(backendDuration) as 'Backend Time (sec)',average(duration) as 'Page Load time (sec)' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES

SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomInteractive) as 'Time to Interactive', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE category = 'Initial page load' AND `mobileOptimized` IS NULL

SELECT average(timeToFetchStart) AS 'Request queueing', average(timeToResponseStart) AS 'First byte', average(firstPaint) as 'First paint', average(firstContentfulPaint) as 'First contentful paint', average(timeToDomInteractive) as 'Time to Interactive', average(timeToDomContentLoadedEventEnd) AS 'DOM content loaded', average(timeToLoadEventEnd) AS 'Window load', average(duration) AS 'Window load + AJAX' FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE category = 'Initial page load' TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(duration,10) AS '10th PLT', percentile(duration,50) AS 'Median PLT', percentile(duration,90) AS '90th PLT', percentile(duration,95) AS '95th PLT' FROM PageView since 1 day ago
SELECT histogram(firstPaint,width:4) as 'First paint' FROM BrowserInteraction   WHERE category = 'Initial page load'
SELECT percentile(firstPaint,50) as 'First paint'   FROM BrowserInteraction  WHERE category = 'Initial page load' facet targetUrl
SELECT percentile(duration, 10, 50, 90, 95), average(duration) FROM PageView since 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 2) AS '' FROM PageView  SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 0.2) AS '' FROM Transaction   SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Longest Time to Interactive (Median) by URL

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(timeToDomInteractive  ,50) as 'Time to Interactive'   FROM BrowserInteraction  WHERE category = 'Initial page load' facet targetUrl
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 2) AS '' FROM PageView  SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT apdex(duration,t: 0.5) AS '' FROM Transaction   SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT average(loadAverageOneMinute), average(loadAverageFiveMinute), average(loadAverageFifteenMinute) FROM SystemSample since 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET userAgentName SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET errorClass SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT average(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES FACET `entityName` since 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError facet errorMessage since 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET requestUri SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET userAgentVersion SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError SINCE 1 hour ago FACET transactionName
SELECT count(*) FROM JavaScriptError FACET stackTrace SINCE 1 day ago

SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticCheck FACET result  since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Request & Response Total Size (KB) over time

nrqlQueries.query: from SyntheticCheck select average(totalRequestHeaderSize+totalRequestBodySize)/1000 as 'Request Size (KB)', average(totalResponseBodySize)/1000 as 'Response Size (KB)'

widgets.title: Request & Response Total Size (KB) over time

nrqlQueries.query: from SyntheticCheck select average(totalRequestHeaderSize+totalRequestBodySize)/1000 as 'Request Size (KB)', average(totalResponseBodySize)/1000 as 'Response Size (KB)' since 1 day ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticCheck FACET monitorName since 1 day ago
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability Rate' FROM SyntheticCheck  SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability' FROM SyntheticCheck  SINCE 1 day ago FACET locationLabel TIMESERIES
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability' FROM SyntheticCheck  SINCE 1 day ago FACET locationLabel
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability' FROM SyntheticCheck SINCE 1 day ago FACET monitorName TIMESERIES 15 minutes
SELECT percentage(count(result), WHERE result = 'SUCCESS') as 'Availability' FROM SyntheticCheck  SINCE 1 day ago FACET monitorName

SELECT average(duration) as 'Average', percentile(duration, 10) as 'p10th', percentile(duration, 50) as 'p50th', percentile(duration, 90) as 'p90th' FROM SyntheticCheck SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Percentiles vs Average Full Page Load

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(duration) as 'Average', percentile(duration, 10) as 'p10th', percentile(duration, 50) as 'p50th', percentile(duration, 90) as 'p90th' FROM SyntheticCheck SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES
